message.body: A favor: could I couch surf at your place next Saturday night? Also: ###### says you must come to his party that night. He "demands" you attend
You are totally welcome to crash. I have a show the night before, and possibly a block party sat afternoon, but I don't see why I couldn't go
Yay!! And thank you! I wish I could go to your show too, but I won't be down until Saturday :-\
